name.narrative: Agencia Suiza para el Desarrollo y la Cooperación COSUDE
Direction du développement et de la coopération (DDC)
Direzione dello sviluppo e della cooperazione (DSC)
Swiss Agency for Development and Cooperation (SDC)
Швейцарское Управление по развитию и сотрудничеству (ШУРС)

reporting-org.narrative: Swiss Agency for Development and Cooperation (SDC)

budget-line.narrative: Development cooperation with the South, Multilateral cooperation, Global challenges, Development Policy, Research and culture.

SDC's operating expenses (also referred to as its global budget) is presented separately. This includes personnel and operating costs as well as expenses for the SDC's direct interventions, certain engagements of the Swiss Humanitarian Aid Unit, secondments, feasibility studies, awareness activities and others.
Support to new EU member states. Through its enlargement contribution, Switzerland helps reduce the economic and social disparities within the enlarged European Union (not ODA).

budget-line.ref: Cooperation with Eastern Europe and CIS
budget-line.narrative: Swiss cooperation with Eastern Europe supports the Western Balkans and countries of the former Soviet Union in their transition to a social market economy and democracy.

The humanitarian aid operations of the SDC are an expression of Switzerland's solidarity towards population groups in distress. The Swiss Humanitarian Aid department focuses on emergency aid, the reconstruction and rehabilitation of disaster-stricken areas, and disaster risk reduction. It places the victims at the centre of its engagement in a spirit of neutrality, independence and impartiality.
Development cooperation with the South, Multilateral cooperation, Global challenges, Development Policy, Research and culture.

expense-line.narrative: Development cooperation with the South, Multilateral cooperation, Global challenges, Development Policy, Research and culture.
Support to new EU member states. Through its enlargement contribution, Switzerland helps reduce the economic and social disparities within the enlarged European Union (not ODA).

expense-line.ref: Cooperation with Eastern Europe and CIS
expense-line.narrative: Swiss cooperation with Eastern Europe supports the Western Balkans and countries of the former Soviet Union in their transition to a social market economy and democracy.

The humanitarian aid operations of the SDC are an expression of Switzerland's solidarity towards population groups in distress. The Swiss Humanitarian Aid department focuses on emergency aid, the reconstruction and rehabilitation of disaster-stricken areas, and disaster risk reduction. It places the victims at the centre of its engagement in a spirit of neutrality, independence and impartiality.
Development cooperation with the South, Multilateral cooperation, Global challenges, Development Policy, Research and culture.
Support to new EU member states. Through its enlargement contribution, Switzerland helps reduce the economic and social disparities within the enlarged European Union (not ODA).

It places the victims at the centre of its engagement in a spirit of neutrality, independence and impartiality.
